title: 29 Bootcut Jeans That Kendrick Lamar Would Approve Of
description: Kendrick Lamar’s 2025 Super Bowl halftime show was a big moment for a lot of things — bootcut jeans especially. The rapper’s lightwash Celine pair made many of us fall in love with the silhouette all over again, perhaps for the first time since the early aughts.It was already on our radars as a 2025 denim trend, especially in spring collections. While dramatic flares, baggy cargos, and barrel-leg jeans continue to trend, bootcut jeans present a more subtle option for those of us who want a sleek pair of everyday denim. They’re ideal for fitting over your cowboy boots or pooling around your on-trend clogs — and most don’t have a $1,200 Celine price tag. We found the best women’s bootcut jeans (in a range of standard, petite, tall, and plus sizes) from some of Refinery29 readers’ favorite brands. Click on to peruse and shop a pair of your own. All linked products are independently selected by our editors. author: Victoria Montalti
excerpt: Bootcut jeans were already predicted to be a 2025 denim trend before Kendrick Lamar wore them to the Super Bowl. But now they’re even more popular. Here are the TK best women’s bootcut jeans to wear this spring.

html:
Kendrick Lamar’s 2025 Super Bowl halftime show was a big moment for a lot of things — bootcut jeans especially. The rapper’s lightwash Celine pair made many of us fall in love with the silhouette all over again, perhaps for the first time since the early aughts.

It was already on our radars as a 2025 denim trend, especially in spring collections. While dramatic flares, baggy cargos, and barrel-leg jeans continue to trend, bootcut jeans present a more subtle option for those of us who want a sleek pair of everyday denim. They’re ideal for fitting over your cowboy boots or pooling around your on-trend clogs — and most don’t have a $1,200 Celine price tag. 

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

We found the best women’s bootcut jeans (in a range of standard, petite, tall, and plus sizes) from some of Refinery29 readers’ favorite brands. Click on to peruse and shop a pair of your own.

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.
